channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FELIX-2348] DM/ ResourceAdapter NPE
item.description:
(this issue concerns Dependency manager in the trunk)

When declaring a ResourceAdapter and a Resource Provider, I always get the following NPE:

Invocation of 'add' failed. - java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException

(I will commit a testcase for this issue)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: attached a proposed patch, which registers the original resource filter into actual resource dependency.

I took a different approach than the patch for fixing this as it should be allowed for resource handlers to be registered without a filter property. That simply means they will be invoked for every resource and is used inside certain resource dependencies that are linked to a specific resource (doing the actual filtering in code instead of in the LDAP like filter).

Ok, I see.

But in this case, should the filter parameter be removed from the two DependencyManager.createResourceAdapter() methods ?
(because now, these filter parameters are not used)
In this case, I will also have to remove them from the corresponding annotations.

oops, sorry Marcel, ignore my last question because I was wrong when saying that the filter was not used anymore by DependencyManager.createResourceAdapter() methods(): it is still used by the resource dependency applied on the ResourceAdapterImpl object.
